name: interzonal
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
between different zones (= areas that a place has been divided into): They are trying to establish an inter-zonal community based on respect for all. The reward for this victory was a place in the interzonal tournament for the world championship. Synonym
interzone
More examplesFewer examplesShe reached the interzonal stage of the world championship on three occasions.He won first place in the interzonal tournament in Stockholm.Zonal actions often have inter-zonal consequences.He decided to return to India and play in the prestigious inter-zonal Duleep Trophy tournament.
